mapper.select: SELECT s.id "s_id" , s.venue_id "s_venue_id" , s.socializing_title "s_socializing_title" , s.category "s_category" , s.detail_category "s_detail_category" , s.address "s_address" , s.place_name "s_place_name" , s.meeting_date "s_meeting_date" , s.meeting_time "s_meeting_time" , s.limit_num "s_limit_num" , s.content "s_content" , s.total_price "s_total_price" , s.img "s_img" , s.regdate "s_regdate" , us.user_id "us_user_id" , us.socializing_id "us_socializing_id" , us.role "us_role" FROM SOCIALIZING s JOIN user_socializing us ON s.id = us.socializing_id WHERE us.socializing_id = #{socializing_id}
